LanguageData.Door.label: rustic door
LanguageData.Door.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.Door_Blueprint.label: rustic door (blueprint)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.label: rustic door (building)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.MDoor.label: 金属门
LanguageData.MDoor.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.MDoor_Blueprint.label: metal door (蓝图)
LanguageData.MDoor_Frame.label: metal door (建造中)
LanguageData.MDoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.CellDoor.label: 牢门
LanguageData.CellDoor.description: Door which prisoners as well as colonists can open. It divides rooms.
LanguageData.CellDoor_Blueprint.label: cell door (蓝图)
LanguageData.CellDoor_Frame.label: cell door (建造中)
LanguageData.CellDoor_Frame.description: Door which prisoners as well as colonists can open. It divides rooms.
LanguageData.Autodoor.label: autodoor
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: A door divides rooms with a closable opening. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Autodoor_Blueprint.label: autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.label: autodoor (building)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.description: A door divides rooms with a closable opening. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Blastdoor.label: 高速自动门
LanguageData.Blastdoor.description: A powered, reinforced door that allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Blastdoor_Blueprint.label: blast autodoor (蓝图)
LanguageData.Blastdoor_Frame.label: blast autodoor (建造中)
LanguageData.Blastdoor_Frame.description: A powered, reinforced door that allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.OpenBlastDoor.label: 大型装甲门 (打开)
LanguageData.OpenBlastDoor.description: A very large gate that provides protection against hostile outside entities. It requires power, and must be manually opened and closed. The gate is currently open.
LanguageData.ClosedBlastDoor.label: 大型装甲门 (关闭)
LanguageData.ClosedBlastDoor.description: A very large gate that provides protection against hostile outside entities. It requires power, and must be manually opened and closed. The gate is currently closed.
LanguageData.ClosedBlastDoor_Blueprint.label: large armor gate (closed) (蓝图)
LanguageData.ClosedBlastDoor_Frame.label: large armor gate (closed) (建造中)
LanguageData.ClosedBlastDoor_Frame.description: A very large gate that provides protection against hostile outside entities. It requires power, and must be manually opened and closed. The gate is currently closed.
LanguageData.JammedBlastDoor.label: 大型装甲门 (卡住)
LanguageData.JammedBlastDoor.description: A very large gate that provides protection against hostile outside entities. It requires power, and must be manually opened and closed. The gate is jammed.
